text: Moneyball is a 2011 American sports drama movie directed by Bennett Miller and written by Steven Zaillian and Aaron Sorkin. The movie is based on the 2003 nonfiction book by Michael Lewis. It stars Brad Pitt and Jonah Hill. They were both nominated for Academy Awards for their roles in this movie. ==References== Category:2011 drama movies Category:2010s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Moneyball (movie)
